summary: Multi-Vendor Jewellery & Clothes Rental Platform with full workflow automation. Model: Vendor → Center → Trial → Sanitization → Rental → Return → QC → Payout. 4 roles: Customer, Vendor, Center, Admin. Tech stack: Next.js/React + Tailwind, Node.js/NestJS, MySQL, Redis, BullMQ, AWS S3/Cloudinary, Razorpay/PhonePe/UPI. Home page redesigned per detailed PRD: premium luxury theme with Royal Gold (#C6A75E), Deep Black (#111111), Ivory White (#F9F6F1), Burgundy accent, Playfair Display headings, Poppins/Inter body, 10-section layout (Hero → Trust Strip → Categories → How It Works → Trending Products → Nearest Centers → Vendor CTA → Testimonials → Footer), conversion optimization elements (sticky CTA, WhatsApp button, popups), SEO & mobile-first.
architectural_notes: Frontend: Next.js + React, Tailwind CSS, Redux/Zustand, role-based routing
Backend: Node.js + NestJS, REST API, JWT auth + role middleware
Database: MySQL (normalized), Redis (caching), BullMQ (payout & notification queues)
Storage: AWS S3 / Cloudinary for product images, videos, sanitization proof
Payment: Razorpay / PhonePe / UPI with webhook verification; commission formula: Rental - Admin Commission - Center Share = Vendor Net
Order status flow: Trial Booked → Trial Completed → Payment Done → Sanitizing → Ready for Handover → Rented → Returned → Closed

Home page design system: Royal Gold (#C6A75E), Deep Black (#111111), Ivory White (#F9F6F1), Burgundy (#7A1E2C); Playfair Display headings, Poppins/Inter body; 12px rounded cards, gold gradient buttons, fade-in animations

existing_features.title: Implement a role-based authentication system with four roles: Customer, Vendor, Center, and Admin. Each role must have secure login/registration, session management using stable tokens stored in the backend actor, and a permission control matrix that gates access to role-specific routes and actions.

Build a public home page with: a hero banner reading 'Try Before You Rent', category sections for Jewellery, Bridal, and Dresses, a Nearest Centers section, a Featured Vendors section, a How It Works step-by-step section, a Sanitization Guarantee badge, and a prominent 'Book Trial' CTA button.

Implement the Customer module with: registration/login with KYC document upload, product browsing with filter by center location and category, trial slot booking, rental booking and online payment (simulated payment flow), wallet and security deposit management, order status tracking through the full status flow (Trial Booked → Trial Completed → Payment Done → Sanitizing → Ready for Handover → Rented → Returned → Closed), rental history view, and dispute raise form.

Implement the Vendor module with: vendor registration including GST and bank KYC fields, product upload with multiple images, rental price, and deposit amount, ability to mark a product as sent to a specific center, real-time inventory status tracking (At Vendor / At Center / On Trial / Rented / Under Sanitization), rental orders list, earnings summary showing gross and net after commission, commission deduction breakdown, and payout history.

Implement the Center module with: receiving and acknowledging vendor inventory, QC verification and approval for trial, trial slot management, POS walk-in customer booking, marking trial as completed, sanitization workflow with a checklist (cleaning type, chemical used, staff name, date/time, before/after image upload, status: Approved/Reclean Required), auto-generation of sanitized tag with unique ID and date stamp, handover confirmation, return QC inspection, and damage charge entry.

Implement the Admin module with: vendor and center approval workflows, product approval queue, configurable admin commission percentage and center revenue share percentage, platform revenue overview, order override capability, force refund action, payout release control, dispute management queue, GST report generation, and an analytics dashboard showing total revenue, active rentals, conversion rate, trial-to-rental percentage, and center performance scores.

Build role-based dashboards for all four roles. Each dashboard must include: summary overview cards, charts for revenue/rentals/performance trends, data tables for orders/products/payouts, date and status filters on tables, CSV export for table data, and an in-app notification panel showing role-relevant workflow events.

Apply a cohesive luxury-boutique visual theme across the entire application. Use a deep jewel-toned palette (e.g., rich emerald, champagne gold, and ivory), elegant serif display typography for headings paired with a clean sans-serif for body text, card-based layouts with generous whitespace, subtle golden accents on interactive elements, and a refined header/navigation bar. Enforce this theme consistently across all four role dashboards and the public home page.

Generate all required static image assets: a hero banner for the home page, category cover images for Jewellery, Bridal, and Dresses, a Sanitization Guarantee badge graphic, and a platform logo mark. Render these as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated.

Rebuild the public home page (frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx) with a full 10-section layout in this order: Hero, Trust Strip, Featured Categories, How It Works, Trending Products, Nearest Centers, Vendor CTA, Testimonials, Footer. Use the design system: Royal Gold (#C6A75E) primary, Deep Black (#111111) secondary, Ivory White (#F9F6F1) background, Burgundy (#7A1E2C) accent, Playfair Display headings, Poppins/Inter body, rounded-xl (12px) cards, soft shadows, gold gradient buttons, smooth scroll animations, and elegant fade-in transitions on scroll.

Redesign the Header and Navigation bar on the public home page. Add a main navigation menu with links: Jewellery, Bridal Sets, Party Wear, Designer Dresses, How It Works, Centers, Become Vendor. Build the Hero Section as a two-column full-width section. Left column: headline 'Try Before You Rent - Luxury Jewellery & Designer Wear', subheading 'Book a trial at your nearest center. Fully sanitized. Zero compromise.', and two CTA buttons: primary 'Book Trial' and secondary 'Explore Collection'. Right column: a premium model image showing jewellery and bridal dress on a subtle gold gradient background. Use the generated hero banner image asset (hero-banner.dim_1440x800.png).

Build the Featured Categories section as a 4-column premium card grid. Categories: Bridal Jewellery, Wedding Lehenga, Party Wear Jewellery, Designer Gowns. Ensure the entire home page is fully mobile-first responsive. Apply lazy loading to all product and category images. Add SEO meta tags to the HTML head: title, description, and Open Graph tags for social sharing. Add structured data as a JSON-LD script tag using the product listing schema for the platform.

Role-based dashboards with overview cards, revenue/rental/performance charts, order/product/payout tables, date/status filters, CSV export, notifications
